item.title: 观点：加密货币与传统金融之间曾经相对清晰的界限已被彻底打破。比特币 ETF 的出现表明，加密世界和传统金融世界都一如既往地贪婪
item.description:
Opinion: What was once a relatively clear boundary between crypto and conventional finance has been broken down for good. The advent of bitcoin ETFs has shown that the worlds of both crypto and traditional finance are as greedy as ever https://t.co/VwacFmc4FS

— Financial Times (@FT) March 12, 2024

item.title: 中央银行今日时事通讯中的量化紧缩初级读本注册 ⬇️ 目前为止进展顺利--但仍有很长的路要走 小国取得的进展最大，但在全球范围内却相形见绌
item.description:
A primer on Quantitative Tightening in the central banks newsletter today

Sign up ⬇️https://t.co/9W1LiN2e7a

- It has gone well so far
- But has a long way to go

Small countries have made most progress but their progress is dwarfed in the global picture pic.twitter.com/Keo96eiTZs

— Chris Giles (@ChrisGiles_) March 12, 2024

item.title: 经过两年的努力，我们终于说服了难以捉摸的 Telegram 首席执行官帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）接受采访，他同意了，并自 2017 年以来首次在媒体上打破沉默。在第一篇文章中，我们谈到了 Telegram 的增长、货币化和潜在的 IPO：
item.description:
After two years of trying to persuade the elusive Telegram CEO Pavel Durov to sit for an interview, he agreed & broke his silence in the media for the 1st time since 2017.

In this 1st piece, we spoke about Telegram's growth, monetisation & potential IPO:https://t.co/FIzWTB4zkJ

— Hannah Murphy (@MsHannahMurphy) March 12, 2024

item.title: 意见：日本已经习惯了出生率下降和人口减少的无情故事。但最近的数字令人不安，要扭转这一局面，需要的不仅仅是经济激励措施
item.description:

— Financial Times (@FT) March 12, 2024

item.title: 每个人都预期经济衰退已久，但它并没有出现：对世界经济的乐观情绪不断升温，企业盈利改善，推动股市屡创新高
item.description:
‘Everyone’s been anticipating a recession for a long time and it hasn’t materialised’: Growing optimism about the world economy and improved corporate earnings is driving stock markets to record highs https://t.co/URkQQv7pjj pic.twitter.com/6FeEkdiRxU

— Financial Times (@FT) March 12, 2024
